name: Osellus Mobile
description: Osellus is a full service mobile development company. We have successfully executed projects for many new mobile ventures and Fortune 1000 clients including Verizon, LG Electronics, NASA, Bank of Montreal, Deloitte Touche, Daimler, Cisco Systems, Samsung and Oracle. We will take your app idea from concept to reality in no time. The result is a beautiful, engaging and useful app that puts you ahead of the competition.
